App Name: 1.1.1.1
App Package Name: com.cloudflare.onedotonedotonedotone

Brief:
1.1.1.1 by Cloudflare provides a private and rapid web browsing experience powered by its free DNS service. It offers a modern protocol that enhances your internet connection's privacy and security, with additional performance benefits available through the WARP+ subscription.

Core Features:

  • üåê Free DNS Service: Enjoy a faster internet with a basic version that's absolutely free of charge.
  • üîê Enhanced Privacy: 1.1.1.1 ensures your traffic is encrypted, keeping your browsing data secure.
  • üõ°Ô∏è Advanced Security: Protects against various threats including malware and phishing with the option to enable '1.1.1.1 for Families'.
  • üöÄ WARP+ Subscription: Access even quicker internet performance by bypassing congested routes and optimizing connection.
  • üñ±Ô∏è One-Touch Setup: An easy and straightforward way to secure and privatize your internet, with just a single touch.

Pros:

  • üëç User-Friendly: The app boasts a one-touch setup that simplifies the process of securing your internet connection.
  • üëç Better Performance: Utilizes Cloudflare's technology to potentially speed up internet performance by 30%.
  • üëç No Data Selling: 1.1.1.1 pledges not to sell any of your data, placing a high importance on user privacy.
  • üëç Continuous Updates: Regularly updated with bug fixes, connectivity improvements, and security enhancements.

Cons:

  • üëé Subscription Costs: While the basic version is free, the WARP+ version comes at a cost for those seeking enhanced performance.
  • üëé Potential Complexity: Users unfamiliar with DNS services may have a learning curve.
  • üëé Feature Changes: Upcoming updates may remove Zero Trust features, requiring users to migrate to a different service.
  • üëé Limited Trial: Any unused portion of a free trial or WARP+ data will be forfeited upon subscribing.

Price:

  • üíµ 1.1.1.1 with WARP is free; WARP+ requires a monthly subscription for unlimited data. Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

No community information was listed for this non-game app.
